sense.def:
Kadar nekaj, na primer koruza ali kava,
is ground
, tisto drobimo, dokler ne nastane droben prašek.

To grind something into a surface
pomeni trdno vtisniti nekaj v površino.

seg.quote: He ground his cigarette in the ashtray.

sense.def:
Kadar stroj
grinds
, oddaja ostre, raskave zvoke.

seg.quote: The lift grinds in the shaft.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj velikega
grinds to a halt
ali
comes to a grinding halt
, se ustavi.

seg.quote: The huge coal cart would grind to a halt at our front door.
Why doesn't the whole economy grind to a halt?

sense.def:
Utrujajoče, dolgočasno in rutinsko delo lahko imenujemo
the grind
.

seg.quote: ...the long and tiresome grind of preparing themselves for college entrance.

sense.def:
To grind someone down
pomeni zelo strogo ravnati z nekom in mu tako vzeti voljo, da bi se nam upiral.
